text: Yassin Ben Balla (born 24 February 1996) is a French professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Eintracht Braunschweig. ==Career== Ben Balla moved to MSV Duisburg on 19 June 2019. He made his professional debut for MSV Duisburg in the 3. Liga on 20 July 2019, starting in the home match against Sonnenhof Großaspach. He moved to Eintracht Braunschweig for the 2020–21 season. ==Personal life== Born in France, Ben Balla is of Moroccan descent. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !rowspan="2"|Division !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Total |- !Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |Amiens B |2014–15 |Championnat National 3 |11||0||colspan=2|—||colspan=2|—||11||0 |- |FC Zürich II |2015–16 |Swiss Promotion League |18||1||colspan=2|—||colspan=2|—||18||1 |- |rowspan="4"|Rot-Weiß Oberhausen |2016–17 |Regionalliga |8||2||colspan=2|—||colspan=2|—||8||2 |- |2017–18 |Regionalliga |30||4||colspan=2|—||colspan=2|—||30||4 |- |2018–19 |Regionalliga |34||7||1||0||colspan=2|—||35||7 |- !colspan="2"|Total !72!!13!!1!!0!!colspan=2|—!!73!!13 |- |MSV Duisburg |2019–20 |3.
